description:
</a>


Join us on 30 September 2014 for an inQube online expert café, networking lunch and digital startup seminar for women on the topic of "Incorporate Your Digital Startup" with structuring and incorporation expert, Ms. Louise Hilditch.  Registration link (please use "MeetUp" code for free entry):  <a href="http://bit.ly/inQubeSSSS4">http://bit.ly/inQubeSSSS4


Ms. Louise Hilditch has worked in the European Parliament, was a lobbyist for a major multinational food corporation, and is co-founder of a successful public affairs consultancy. She has set up and managed several not-for-profit organisations in Belgium and elsewhere in the EU and now runs Local Knowledge, setting up businesses and organisations on in Belgium.

This event marks the fourth installment in the 2014 inQube Online Expert Café and Expert Seminar Series "Stop Stopping and Start Starting" - brought to you by the Digital Leadership Institute and Microsoft Europe - that aims to explore the challenges faced by (digital) female starters and to deliver practical, expert advice to help them through the early stages of (digital) startup.

The "Incorporate Your Digital Startup" event with Ms. Louise Hilditch will take the form of an online expert café in talkshow format where Ms. Hilditch will share her background and her three secrets for startup sucess.  This will be followed by a networking lunch and digital startup seminar for women addressing the following topics:

• Options for structuring and incorporating your startup in Belgium

• Avantages and risks inherent in each incorporation option

• Practical advice for taking the first steps to incorporate your startup in Belgium


Draft Event Agenda:
9:00-9:30:  Welcome Coffee & Registration
9:30-10:30: Seminar & Participant Introduction (Maximum 3 minutes per Participant)
*10:30-11:00: Online Expert Café (talkshow format with Expert & audience participation)
11:00-11:15:  Coffee Break
*11:15-12:15:  Expert-led Digital Startup Seminar - Part 1
12:15-13:00: Lunch & Networking
*13:00-14:00: Expert-led Digital Startup Seminar - Part 2

*Broadcast Online

Registration:

Onsite participation in this event is via a one-time, non-refundable registration fee, with space limited to 20 participants.  Please contact us if you would like to be considered for a scholarship to attend onsite.

The online portion of this event (noted with asterisks above) is free to all members of the inQube community.  In order to follow the event live online, please sign up for free membership to the inQube platform here:http://bit.ly/inqubeplatform

Online Participation Instructions:

 To participate in the event online, please visit the link below prior to the meeting and download the Lync meeting applet in your browser.  We advise you to join the meeting 10-15 minutes ahead of the timeslots noted in the Agenda. The link for the event is below, where you can also download the Lync applet: http://bit.ly/inQubeLyncSSSS14
name: inQube: Incorporate your (Digital) Startup

description:
Join us on 25 November 2014 for an inQube online expert café, networking lunch and digital startup seminar for women on the topic of "Build Your Digital Startup for Success" with startup coach and angel investor, Ms. Janneke Niessen.  

Ms. Niessen is a serial entrepreneur, technologist, innovator, and creative thinker. Most recently, she co-founded Improve Digital, a leading European marketing technology firm, and she currently serves as the company’s Chief Innovation Officer. She also invests considerable time serving as a member of advisory boards and mentor for start-ups, and she is active as an angel investor. Janneke is is co-initiator of InspiringFifty a pan-European programme that identifies, encourages, develops, and showcases women in leadership positions within the technology sector. Janneke was recently named 2014 EY Entrepreneur of the Year, and past recognition includes Deloitte Fast 50, Deloitte Rising Star, Emerce European Startup Top 10, The Next Women Top 100 Most Influential Businesswomen, and Red Herring 100.

This event marks the fifth installment in the 2014 inQube Online Expert Café and Expert Seminar Series "Stop Stopping and Start Starting" - brought to you by the Digital Leadership Institute and Microsoft Europe - that aims to explore the challenges faced by (digital) female starters and to deliver practical, expert advice to help them through the early stages of (digital) startup.

The "Build Your Digital Startup for Success" event with Janneke Niessen will take the form of an online expert café in talkshow format where Ms. Niessen will share her background and her three secrets for startup sucess.  This will be followed by a networking lunch and digital startup seminar for women addressing the following topics:

• What are the key pitfalls to avoid in launching my digital startup?
• What are best practices for scaling and growing my digital startup?
• How can I optimise funding opportunities to make my startup sustainable?

Draft Event Agenda:
9:00-9:30:  Welcome Coffee & Registration
9:30-10:15: Seminar & Participant Introduction (Maximum 3 minutes per Participant)
*10:15-11:00: Online Expert Café (talkshow format with Expert & audience participation)
11:00-11:15:  Coffee Break
*11:15-12:15:  Expert-led Digital Startup Seminar
12:15-13:30: Lunch & Networking

*Broadcast Online

Registration:
Onsite participation in this event is via a one-time, non-refundable registration fee, with space limited to 20 participants. Please contact us if you would like to be considered for a scholarship to attend onsite.

The online portion of this event (noted with asterisks above) is free to all members of the inQube community. 

Online Participation Instructions:
To participate in the event online, please visit the link below prior to the meeting and download the Lync meeting applet in your browser.  We advise you to join the meeting 10-15 minutes ahead of the timeslots noted in the Agenda. Link to this event and for downloading the Lync applet is here: http://bit.ly/inQubeLyncSSSS14

2014 inQube "Stop Stopping and Start Starting" Calendar
Below is the full calendar for the 2014 inQube "Stop Stopping and Start Starting" series.  Each event entails a thirty-minute online, interactive café with an expert partner of the inQube platform, followed by a short lunch break, then a two-hour digital startup seminar led by the expert on the noted topic:

• COMPLETED:  6 March, 15:00-16:00 (International Women's Day) at DIGITALEUROPE:  The Right Mindset for (Digital) Startup Success with Ms. Mirna Hidalgo, Wiser Gems

• COMPLETED: 17 June, 11:00-14:00:  Start and Grow Your Digital Enterprise with Ms. Karin Maquet, KAMMCO

• COMPLETED: 17 July, 9:00-13:30: Digital Branding for Digital Starters with Ms. Cheryl Miller, Digital Leadership Institute

• COMPLETED 30 September, 9:00-14:00:  Incorporate Your Digital Startup with Ms. Louise Hilditch, LocalKnowledge

• 25 November, 9:00-14:00: Manage Your Digital Startup for Success with Ms. Janneke Niessen, Improve Digital
name: inQube: Manage your Digital Startup for Success
